arts.ttl: PLAYER RATINGS: How Carlisle United fared against Morecambe
arts.sum: Carlisle United suffered a woeful 1-0 home defeat to Morecambe – so how did we rate the players at Brunton Park?

arts.ttl: Morecambe strike blow with win over relegation rivals Carlisle
arts.sum: Gwion Edwards scored the only goal before Carlisle had Jon Mellish sent off.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United boss's message ahead of huge Boxing Day clash
arts.sum: Carlisle United boss Mike Williamson says “we need everyone” to help drive the Blues to three huge points against Morecambe on Boxing Day.

arts.ttl: Top-flight Blues: Last-minute agony sours Carlisle United's Christmas
arts.sum: Part 22 of our weekly 50th anniversary series charting the events of Carlisle United’s 1974/75 top-flight season...

arts.ttl: Take our big Carlisle United quiz of 2024!
arts.sum: How well do you remember 2024 at Carlisle United? Test your knowledge with our big quiz of the year...

arts.ttl: Remembering the Carlisle United legends we lost in 2024
arts.sum: REVIEW OF 2024: The years saw farewells to legendary chairman Andrew Jenkins, maverick star Stan Bowles and 1960s favourite Willie Carlin.

arts.ttl: Carlisle United boss to weigh up fresh loan moves for teenagers
arts.sum: Carlisle United boss Mike Williamson says he will consider fresh loan moves for Anton Dudik and Sam Hetherington in the new year.
